Title: silverstripe/framework may disclose database credentials during connection failure
Description:
When running SilverStripe 3.7 or 4.x in dev mode with the mysqli database driver, there is a potential to disclose the connection details.

We have denylisted the sensitive parts of the connection information from being included in dev mode stack traces when database errors occur.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.7.0-rc1 before 3.7.1, all versions starting from 4.0.0-rc1 before 4.0.5, all versions starting from 4.1.0-rc1 before 4.1.3, all versions starting from 4.2.0-rc1 before 4.2.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.7.0-rc1, all versions starting from 3.7.1 before 4.0.0-rc1, all versions starting from 4.0.5 before 4.1.0-rc1, all versions starting from 4.1.3 before 4.2.0-rc1, all versions starting from 4.2.2
